Mindful Practices: Course 2
Introduction to SEL

Safety in Your Classroom

Take a few moments to think about your classroom:

  • What does SAFETY look like, sound like, and feel like for you and your students in each of these three areas?
  • What is in place in your classroom or school that allows this safety to thrive?

Read the examples of safety and supports for Physical Safety, Emotional Safety, and Mental (Psychological) Safety below. Fill in each chart with at least one example for safety and supports.
